name: Don't stop eighth Note!
description:
BIG NEWS ! The most popular Japanese game in 2017 DON'T STOP EIGHTH NOTE have come to your CITY. What you are waitting for ?.Come and experience this crazy game- Eighth Note for free now!

Seventh Note is very easy to play, use your voice to control the Seventh Note ,avoid obstacles, get more points, roaring open to it, because the Eighth Note decided to jump amplitude of voice, shouted so small called essential！All you need to do is helping the little quaver or Eighth Note through various of obstacles. But the control may not be that easy. Because you need to control the quaver or Eighth Note through voice instead of screen tap.

One thousand players called a thousand! Share with your friends, listen to what they called. The louder the voice, the higher the quaver or Eighth Note jumps. Move forward smoothly by keeping a small voice out. There are many cleverly designed obstacles. If you want to win, just keep making sound according to the game's beat! Do be shy! Just make sounds！

Features:
Advance by keeping a small voice out.
Jump in a loud voice.
Make the highest jumps with the loudest voice.

Tips:
Don't play the game when others are sleeping.
Please play in a quiet place.
